summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Soothing Gentle Foaming Face Cleanser with Shea Butter is a creamy foaming facial cleanser for very dry to sensitive skin removes makeup, pollution + impurities for soft, comfortable skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently dissolves makeup, impurities + pollutantsSoothes + softens dry or sensitive skinHydrates, nourishes + comfortsDermatologist-testedSoap- and SLS-freeKey IngredientsGentle Complex [Organic Golden Gentian* & Organic Lemon Balm* extracts] softens + soothesOrganic Chamomile* extract soothes + softens dry or sensitive skin during makeup removalOrchid Shea Butter* comforts, nourishes + reinforces the skin’s barrier functionOrganic Soapwort* extract’s gentle natural foaming action removes all traces of dirt + grime for a clean, balanced, clear complexionMoringa extract targets pollutants, while preserving skin’s natural moisture balanceResearch Results97% perfectly clean skin*95% soft skin*90% soothed skin**Consumer test - 110 women, after one use - tested for 2 weeksItem 2626927How To UseLATHER: Apply a dime-size amount over damp face and neck, and work into a lather. Avoid eye area.MASSAGE: Gently massage over skin using circular motions, moving from the center of your face, outward.RINSE: Splash with cool water in the morning; warm water in the evening. Pat dry.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycol Distearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Propanediol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, Glyceryl Behenate, Coconut Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Phenoxyisopropanol, Parfum/Fragrance, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Isethionate, Chlorphenesin, Xanthan Gum, Disodium Edta, Citric Acid, Maltodextrin, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract*, Saponaria Officinalis Leaf Extract, Gentiana Lutea Extract*, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Ci 19140/Yellow 5, Ci 17200/Red 33, [V4330A].*Domaine Clarins.
how_to_use: LATHER: Apply a dime-size amount over damp face and neck, and work into a lather. Avoid eye area.MASSAGE: Gently massage over skin using circular motions, moving from the center of your face, outward.RINSE: Splash with cool water in the morning; warm water in the evening. Pat dry.

reviews.headline: The best!!!!
reviews.comments:
Clarins sadly changed the formula for their staple hydrating cleanser (the cream bottle) in the fall of 2024. I used the old formula for years and adored it…the new formula is drying and my skin squeaked when washing off. 

I went to Bloomingdales to talk to the clarins rep and she confirm it had changed. She recommended this gentle version (pink bottle) and I was immediately sold. It's fantastic!
reviews.nickname: Dry skin even in wet Florida

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm new to cleansers. Up until a few months ago, I had only ever used soap to clean my face. I switched to a popular cleanser also by a popular French brand and was ok with it..because I had nothing to compare it to.

 I ran out and decided to try something different. I ordered the Soothing Foaming cleanser by Clarins. I tried it for the first time this morning and was blown away! It was so creamy and felt so good on my face. A little goes a long way! This bottle will definitely last me at least a year compared to the other cleanser that lasted me about 5 months. 

Clarins never disappoints!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Cleanser I've Ever Used!

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm glad I decided to try this, my face is soft and it does not irritate my skin, I have very sensitive skin
faceoff_negative.headline: Soothing gentle foaming face
